overview:
• Innovater by heart
  • Candidate of Computer Science, bachelor of Mathematics, Aalborg university.
  • Danish-MBA (HD-A), Aarhus Businessschool
  • 12 years experience as CEO of software and innovation companies
  • Started 5 companies
  • High endurance and willpower, completed 10 marathons
  • 7 years experience as member of “board of directors” in innovative SMB companies

  • Expert at strategic, tactical and operational control of innovation based companies Specialties

  • Computers technology

  • Innovation strategy and tactics
  • Sales and negotion
